Reception Hosted by Russian Consul-General in Chongjin 
    Chongjin, August 16 (KCNA) -- Russian Consul-General in Chongjin Arkady Lavrov hosted a reception Monday on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
 Present on invitation were Kim Song Gwon, vice-chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, and officials concerned. And officials of the Russian consulate general were on hand.    
 Speeches were made at the reception.

Australian Foreign Minister Arrives
    Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Alexander Downer, foreign minister of the Commonwealth of Australia, arrived here on August 17.
 The foreign minister and his party were greeted at the airport by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and officials concerned.
